original_title: TMZ Investigates: What Really Happened to Richard Simmons
overview: Investigating why beloved fitness icon Richard Simmons hasn't been seen for over eight years. TMZ speaks to the people closest to him including Bruce Vilanch, Suzanne Somers, Dr. Phil, and Simmons' longtime costume designer, Leslie Wilshire.
title: TMZ Investigates: What Really Happened to Richard Simmons
